scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: "The Office of Public Events plans and orchestrates many major campus events, including Parents' and Family Weekend and all of UCSB's commencement ceremonies. In addition, the office frequently assists individual campus departments in arranging special events and receptions."
From Office of Public Events page, http://www.instadv.ucsb.edu/pe/index.shtml

The office organizes Commencement and Parents' and Family Weekend, among other events. The Office of Public Events was previously known as the Office of Public Ceremonies / Committee on Public Ceremonies, then briefly the Office of Public Events Ceremonies.
The collection is arranged chronologically and contains memos, and event flyers and invitations. Events include Charter Day, Parents' and Family Weekend, and Commencement.
